page.title: 06My old house by James G
page.content: My old house,St.Lawrence Chapel,is about eight hundred years old.It used to be an inn for the pilgrims. Travellers used to stop for a drink of water and a piece of bread or to stay for the night . The house was then turned into a Chapel and priests came to pray there. Once,half of the Chapel burned down so they had to build it up again. Some men dug a tunnel from the house to the river but about three hundred years ago it collapsed with two people in it.Later on,as some men filled in a cellar,one man slipped and his legs were chopped off to release him. Other old houses in Halling include Pring's Cottage,Clements Farm,Court Lodge Farmhouse,The Black Boy Public House,Manor Farm House and Bourne House. {
